task: Read book recommended by Ilya: 'Speak Lord, Your Servant is Listening'. Once done, have a discussion about it.

assignees.name: Mark Bu
notes: I am struggling to read the book by itself because the topics aren't registering to me very easily. The book feels insightful and reflective, although somewhat dry for my taste. I am going to find it easier to read once I start having discussions about the topics presented in the book. Then, I can go back and pay attention to specific topics in the book.
